Flow.description: -20/09/2025 : removed the static Id dependency -20/01/2025 - Checked Site Manager lookup to use CASE -23-02-2023 - change get account element and account required element added. -03-02-2023 - On Invalid Postal Code do not wipe other details when we click previous. -Domestic Customer can process with new quote - Quote Description auto-populated from Sales Description's first 200 char Curr: Sales Note Changed to richTextArea Prev: Attach Files added.
